rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, Bohemian decor, and ample open space.
Dining area that can be extended or converted into a breakfast nook; features an open layout complementing the living room.
Functional and modern kitchen with Bohemian accents, adjacent to dining area, integrated storage and open-plan design for easy movement.
Master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows, private balcony emphasizing West-facing view, Bohemian style decor, and ample storage.
Secondary bedroom designed with a Bohemian aesthetic, incorporating natural lighting and flexible space for personalization.
Tertiary bedroom featuring open design elements and floor-to-ceiling windows for an airy feel.
Primary bathroom attached to the master bedroom, designed with modern fixtures and Bohemian accents.
Guest bathroom for shared use; features a streamlined design consistent with overall aesthetic.
Study area integrated into the living space, offering a Bohemian vibe with versatile seating and natural lighting.
Private gym area dedicated to fitness needs, designed as a flexible multi-use space within the layout.

openings.description: Primary entrance with a modern yet Bohemian design, facilitating Vastu compliant entry.
Floor-to-ceiling window that provides abundant natural light and emphasizes the West-facing orientation for positive energy flow.
Series of large windows ensuring ample daylight, aligning with Vastu recommendations for openness.
Balcony access door leading to a private outdoor space aligned with the West-facing orientation.
